title: 107_hr379
content: Public School Construction Partnership Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the treatment of qualified public educational facility bonds as exempt facility bonds. Defines a qualified public educational facility as any school facility which is: (1) part of a public elementary school or a public secondary school. And (2) owned by a private, for-profit corporation pursuant to a public-private partnership agreement with a State or local educational agency. Provides for an exception from the State volume cap. Sets forth provisions concerning: (1) time-related spending requirements for public school construction bonds and doubling the arbitrage rebate exception for governmental bonds used to finance education facilities. And (2) the treatment of public school construction bonds as qualified tax-exempt obligations.
